# Pull Request Template

**Please follow this template to help us process your PR more efficiently.**

## 1. PR Type

*   [ ] Bugfix
*   [ ] New Feature
*   [ ] Documentation Update
*   [ ] Refactoring
*   [ ] Chore
*   [ ] Testing

## 2. Summary of Changes

*   Provide a concise summary of the changes introduced in this pull request.
*   What problem does this PR solve? What new functionality does it add?

## 3. Motivation

*   Why are these changes necessary?
*   Link to any relevant issues or discussions (e.g., `#123`).

## 4. Checklist

**Please check all applicable boxes:**

*   [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (e.g., Apex Technical Authority standards).
*   [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
*   [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
*   [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation.
*   [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
*   [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works.
*   [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes.
*   [ ] Any dependent components have been updated or are compatible.

## 5. Screenshots (if applicable)

*   If your changes affect the UI or user experience, please provide screenshots or a brief video demonstrating the changes.

## 6. Additional Information

*   Anything else we should know? Any other context, dependencies, or potential risks?

**Architectural Vision:** Apex Technical Authority Standards (Late 2025 Edition)
